author: bayard
msg: Applying my patch from #IO-102 - fixes readSwappedLong(InputStream) for the possibility that not all 8 bytes would be read by input.read(bytes)

author: smilek
msg: added jetspeed.widget.SiteManagerTreeRPCController for use by portal site manager portlet

author: abrown
msg: DERBY-2131: Porting changes from trunk to 10.2.
Use a privileged block when calling out to the JAXP parser so that
users running with a security manager can insert XML values that
reference external DTDs without encountering security exceptions.

author: agilliland
msg: merging in changes from trunk revision 482833 which fixes a bug where paging urls are not correct for tag urls.
